text:
="preserve">Wolfgang Engelmann (27 June 1942 – 12 November 2020) was a German politician. He was a member of the Christian Democratic Union (CDU). Engelmann was a member of the Bundestag from 1990 to 1998. Engelmann was born in Oelsnitz, then-East Germany.
Engelmann died on 12 November 2020 at the age of 78.
